summary: AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION NOT SHIFTING FROM REVERSE TO FIRST GEAR. CAUSING THE ENGINE TO RACE BUT MOVING AS THOUGH IT IS IN SECOND OR THIRD GEAR TO START FROM A DEAD STOP.  ONCE MOVING AT SECOND GEAR SPEED IT IS WORKING FINE.  SERVICE ENGINE LIGHT IS ON.  WHEN SCANNED IT SHOWS CODES P0740 AND P1860 (P0740 IS TCC SENSOR MALFUNCTION ---P1860 IS  SHIFT PLATE D GROUNDED TO BATTERY)WHEN CODES ARE CLEARED THE CODES COME BACK.  TRANSMISSION FLUID AND FILTER HAVE BEEN REPLACED .   *NLM
